| Overview                = The Taliban were an Islamic extremist militant group in [[Afghanistan]].
| History                 = In 1996, the Taliban came to power in [[Afghanistan]], and achieved global notoriety by harboring and hiding [[Osama bin Laden (Earth-616)|Osama bin Laden]], architect of the [[911|September 11th, 2001]] terrorist attacks.<!-- {{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Afghanistan]]'s entry}} -->

Their government was overthrown and a democracy installed, but the country remained occupied by [[North Atlantic Treaty Organization (Earth-616)|NATO]] peacekeeping forces as the Taliban's presence remained.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Afghanistan]]'s entry}}
